# AudioHardwareDestroyAggregateDevice(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

- [ AudioHardwareDestroyAggregateDevice(_:) ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwaredestroyaggregatedevice(_:))

-  AudioHardwareDestroyAggregateDevice(_:) 

Function# AudioHardwareDestroyAggregateDevice(_:)

iOS 7.0+iPadOS 7.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.9+

```
func AudioHardwareDestroyAggregateDevice(_ inDeviceID: AudioObjectID) -> OSStatus
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwaredestroyaggregatedevice(_:)#parameters)

`inDeviceID`The AudioObjectID of the AudioAggregateDevice to destroy.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwaredestroyaggregatedevice(_:)#return-value)

An OSStatus indicating success or failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiohardwaredestroyaggregatedevice(_:)#discussion)

This routine destroys the given AudioAggregateDevice.

The actual destruction of the device is asynchronous and may take place after the call to this routine has returned.
